additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Butane, Alcohol denat., Isobutane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Oryza Sative Starch, Isopropyl Myristate, Silica, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aqua, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Cetrimonium Chloride, CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77891.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye. Danger. Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not spray into eyes.

description: Root Retoucher: Temporary root cover spray that instantly covers regrowth in a few seconds.Covers regrowth in an instant even on grey hair.Washes out in 1 shampoo.Up to 40 applications.Washes out in 1 shampoo.Up to 25 applications.
name: Root Retoucher Spray Brown
